title: Augusta National and U.S.G.A. Drawn Into Justice Department Antitrust Inquiry
description: The Justice Department is investigating the PGA Tour for anticompetitive behavior in its dealings with LIV Golf, the breakaway Saudi-backed league.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder and Glenn Thrush
media:description: Augusta National Golf Club is being looked at as part of a Department of Justice antitrust probe.
